TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Saruc, title = Saruc, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saruc} }

S.FORM: = Saruc = Gaga mniq Tawyuensu Fusingcyu ka alang Saruc. 44 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 154 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 98% niqan 151 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 2% niqan 3 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Tayal 95%, Amis 1%, Bunun 1%, ni rahuq na o 1%. Pnyahan pnatas

= Saroc = Gaga mniq Tawyoenso Fosingcyo ka alang Saroc. 44 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 154 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 98% niqan 151 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 2% niqan 3 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Tayal 95%, Amis 1%, Bonon 1%, ni rahoq na o 1%. Pnyahan pnatas
